definition: ibis/Japanese crested ibis (Nipponia nippon)/same as 朱鹮

sentences.english: Did you know that the scarlet ibis' color comes from the shrimp it eats?
sentences.chinese: 你知不知道红朱鹭之所所以红色是因为它吃虾？

sentences.english: The foamy water of the ocean appears like snow covering the feet of these ibis.
sentences.chinese: 这起泡沫的海水呈现像积雪盖在这些朱鹭的脚。
几乎所有的鹮科鸟类都能飞，但“奇异朱鹭”不会飞。

sentences.english: It's a scarlet ibis, " Daddy said."
sentences.chinese: “它是一只深红色的朱鹭，”爸爸说。

definition: (bird species of China) white stork (Ciconia ciconia)
(bird species of China) common blackbird (Turdus merula)
(bird species of China) greater flamingo (Phoenicopterus roseus)
(bird species of China) brown booby (Sula leucogaster)
(bird species of China) eastern yellow wagtail (Motacilla tschutschensis)
spoonbill (wading bird of the family Threskiornithidae)
vulture/(bird species of China) griffon vulture (Gyps fulvus)
(bird species of China) blue-winged pitta (Pitta moluccensis)
(bird species of China) great white pelican (Pelecanus onocrotalus)
